holidays.title: Apolinario Mabini Day
holidays.description: Do not miss celebrating Apolinario Mabini Day this July 23. Get ready!

holidays.title: Fast of Shiva Asar B'Tammuz
holidays.description: Join Jewish people across the globe as they mark a day of tragedies in their history.

holidays.title: Fast of Tammuz
holidays.description: Take full advantage of this fast day as it’s also a day to repent.

holidays.title: Hot Enough For Ya Day
holidays.description: Make the best of summer by asking, “Hot enough for ya?” and having fun in the sun!

holidays.title: International Yada Yada Yada Day
holidays.description: Learn how the holiday came to be, facts about “Seinfeld,” and many ways to celebrate!

holidays.title: National Sprinkle Day
holidays.description: Join us as we make our day just a bit more colorful this Sprinkles Day!

holidays.title: National Vanilla Ice Cream Day
holidays.description: Ice-cream, you-scream, let’s all scream for the iconically delicious vanilla ice cream!

holidays.title: National Women Touched By Addiction Day
holidays.description: Help raise awareness about an increasingly urgent social issue this National Women Touched by Addiction Day.

holidays.title: Peanut Butter and Chocolate Day
holidays.description: Enjoy peanut butter and chocolate, a combination that unexpectedly goes together for a taste explosion!

holidays.title: World Sjogren's Day
holidays.description: Find out the history of Sjögren’s syndrome and what you can do to help.

holidays.title: Daniel Radcliffe’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented, award-winning actor, charming the audience is like second nature.

holidays.title: David Dobrik’s Birthday
holidays.description: Just like technology, he evolved and reimagined content creation for his YouTube channel.

holidays.title: Marlon Wayans’s Birthday
holidays.description: An actor, writer, producer, and comic — he is the human embodiment of a swiss army knife.

holidays.title: Paul Wesley’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is unlike the characters he usually plays — let’s learn more about the talented Paul Wesley.

holidays.title: Slash’s Birthday
holidays.description: Get ready to learn more about one of the greatest guitarists of all time.
